revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_BasicAttack}} '''A_BasicAttack''' (int ''meleedamage'', string ''meleesound'', string ''missiletype'', float ''missileheight'')
Parametrized version of [[A_ComboAttack]]. [[A_CustomComboAttack]] is more versatile.
== Examples == Missile: TROO EF 6 A_FaceTarget TROO G 4 A_BasicAttack (5, "imp/melee", "TundraImpBall", 24) goto See
[[category:Decorate Generic Attack functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:BasicAttack}}
